p: In this randomized double-blind placebo-controlled clinical trial, the efficacy and safety of cinnamon oil that has been claimed to be effective for treatment of patients with functional dyspepsia were assessed. To our knowledge, this study is the first evaluating cinnamon oil effects in functional dyspepsia. According to the potential pharmaceutical agent proven in several studies, it is possible to say that administration of this plant to the diet possibly attenuates the symptoms of gastrointestinal diseases.
